subject: AI & Agents
title: The Role of Data
description: One-minute skill: The Role of Data.

hook.text: An AI trained only on cat photos will see cats everywhere â€” even in clouds.

buildup.text: Data is the raw material. Without it, an AI model is an empty shell.

discovery.text: The quality and diversity of training data shapes everything the model can do.

twist.text: Feed it biased data and it learns those biases as if they were facts.

climax.text: Garbage data in, confident garbage out â€” the model won't warn you.

punchline.text: AI is only as good as the data it learned from.

quiz.question: What happens when AI is trained on biased data?
options: It learns and reproduces those biases
